content: The ImplementationGuide resource type doesn't have any element(s) to carry business identifiers. Is this deliberate? Have I overlooked something?
There also doesn't appear to be a standard extension for such; is that right?
hasn't come up before. Is it needed?
I just stumbled upon http://hl7-fhir.github.io/resource.html#identifiers, isn't this what you are looking for?
So far we haven't had a use-case for business identifiers for IGs. If there is one, we could certainly define an extension.
We have identifiers (OIDs) for our "publications". For us, an ImplementationGuide is just another publication, so we'd like one.
Yeah, I know, and I don't mind creating one; I just wanted to make sure that that's what I needed to do.
